This is the simplest code sni=
ppet I've made till now.

		
CrawlController ctrl	=3D this.getController();=

if (ctrl instanceof MBeanCrawlController) {
	MBeanCrawlController mctrl =
=3D (MBeanCrawlController)ctrl;
	CrawlJob job =3D mctrl.getCrawlJob();
}

B=
ut be ware!!!! that this is a "hack" according to comments in the code.
